mapper.select: SELECT m.market_no , m.user_id , m.market_category , m.market_title , m.market_price , m.market_date , q.qna_count , (SELECT COUNT(qna_no) qna_new FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 AND qna_sort = 0 ) qna_new , (SELECT COUNT(market_no) FROM TB_MARKET) market_count , (SELECT COUNT(report_no) FROM TB_REPORT) report_count , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_USER WHERE status = 2) userBan_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE board_status = 1) boardBan_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE comment_status = 2) commentBan_count , (SELECT count(qna_no) FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_sort = 3) resign_count FROM TB_MARKET m , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) qna_count, market_no FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 GROUP BY market_no) q WHERE m.market_no = q.market_no(+) AND (q.market_no IS NOT NULL OR q.market_no IS NULL) ORDER BY m.market_date DESC

SELECT report_no , user_id , report_type , report_num , report_group , report_step , report_user , report_reason , report_date , report_result , (SELECT count(report_no) FROM TB_REPORT WHERE report_result = 0) report_new FROM TB_REPORT
WHERE report_type = 4
WHERE report_type = 0
WHERE report_type = 1
ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT user_id , user_nickname , user_name , user_phone , user_level , status FROM TB_USER WHERE status = 2
SELECT board_no , user_id , board_category , board_title , board_date , board_status FROM TB_BOARD WHERE board_status = 1
SELECT board_no , user_id , comment_no , comment_step , comment_date , comment_status FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE comment_status = 2

SELECT u.user_id , u.user_nickname , u.user_name , u.user_phone , u.user_level , u.status , q.qna_title , q.qna_content , q.qna_date , (SELECT count(qna_no) FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 AND qna_sort = 3) resign_new FROM TB_USER u, TB_QNA q WHERE u.user_id = q.user_id AND q.qna_sort = 3 ORDER BY q.qna_date DESC
